name: imageCopy
syntax: imageCopy(name, x, y, width, height [, dx] [, dy])
member: someImage.copy(x, y, width, height [, dx] [, dy])
description: Copies a rectangular area of an image.

params.name: name
params.description: The ColdFusion image on which this operation is performed.

params.name: x
params.description: The x coordinate of the source rectangle.

params.name: y
params.description: The y coordinate of the source rectangle.

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the source rectangle.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the source rectangle.

params.name: dx
params.description: The x coordinate of the destination rectangle.

params.name: dy
params.description: The y coordinate of the destination rectangle.

examples.title: Using copy member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Copy the center of the image, rotate it 180 degrees about its center and paste it back into the original image
